author: ngn
msg: Getting docs into shape for M2

author: nbubna
msg: 1. Catch UnsupportedEncodingException instead of generic Exception when creating InputStreamReader in acquireReader.
2. Move HTTP status code check and potential exception throw earlier in acquireReader method, so we fail as fast as possible.
4. Add resource cleanup in these cases:
- In acquireString (for absolute URLs), close Reader in new finally block.
- In acquireReader, close InputStream and call HttpURLConnection.disconnect in catch blocks
- In acquireReader, wrap InputStreamReader in new SafeClosingHttpURLConnectionReader, which will call HttpURLConnection.disconnect when the Reader is closed.

author: nbubna
msg: copy velocity.properties for velstruts build too

author: jmcconnell
msg: continuum-758 converted continuum-core over to use the plexus-maven-plugin where it can in generation of the components.xml and then a merge with the components can can't be totally configured that way.  This tore a lot of the meat out of the existing components.xml and should make working with the settings we need to manage with it a lot easier.  I commented where the components that are in continuum-core that couldn't be configured with the plugin in the components.xml file that we are merging in.
